Posts.Title: Second Call back On Mammogram and scared

Posts.Content:
Hi Bev,
I live in Texas. The law is called "Henda's Law", house bill 2102. The only draw back is that the insurance companies have not yet been required to pay for this supplemental testing. :(
Thank you for your hugs. I pray for continued good health for you.
Angela
Posts.Title: Second Call back On Mammogram and scared

Posts.Content: I went in yesterday for the recall mammo and thank God everything is ok.Â  They informed me that it is now a state law to inform patients that if they have dense breasts it is recommended that they have supplemental testing. ie. ultrasound.
